timeline.bodyText: is it possible that the az is null here?
timeline.author: doktoric

replies.bodyText: The FreeIPA cloud formation template was simplified. The AZs were needed when creating subnets which only cloudbreak core does. As a result it is no longer needed in the cloud formation template for FreeIPA. In order for the template to process I had to avoid sending the AZ parameter into the template processor. But I needed to only do this for FreeIPA and not core. As a result, I changed FreeIPA to not set the AZ since it is not used that way the common code could check if it was null and optionally use the AZ parameter.
replies.author: jamisonbennett

It was replaced with Location location = location(region(stack.getRegion())); which does not set the AZ.
The FreeIPA cloud formation template was simplified. The AZs were needed when creating subnets which only cloudbreak core does. As a result it is no longer needed in the cloud formation template for FreeIPA. In order for the template to process I had to avoid sending the AZ parameter into the template processor. But I needed to only do this for FreeIPA and not core. As a result, I changed FreeIPA to not set the AZ since it is not used that way the common code could check if it was null and optionally use the AZ parameter.

timeline.message:
CB-1141 & CB-5159: Add high availability options to FreeIPA

Simplified the AWS and Azure FreeIPA cloud formation templates. Some
properties were made optional in the template builder so that unused
FreeIPA properties could be removed. All FreeIPA nodes are gateway
nodes, so the FreeIPA CORE node option was removed.

Fixed the HA logic for the number of processes to use for krb5kdc.

Added a salt hardfail rule when installing FreeIPA.

Added an optional environment property called instanceCountByGroup to
specify the number of HA instances of FreeIPA. This property was also
added to the database table.

Rename master group to master0 so that it will accommodate upgrades to
multi AZ in the future which will be named master0, master1, etc.

Added validation checks to allow for up to 4 instances.

Tested manually with a local deployment of cloudbreak by deploying an
HA cluster in Azure and AWS.
